HEADER.title: Step away from sore feet with Bähler custom made insoles
HEADER.subtitle: Effective relief from:
HEADER.description1: Whether it is for sports, any physical problems or everyday use, this extremely individual design allows us to achieve not only the correct fitting but also the desired wearing comfort.
HEADER.description2: From RMB 1,000 with free delivery - direct from Zurich, Switzerland
HEADER.description3: And now available for the first time in China!
HEADER.hero-title: Get the same comfort as the Swiss

SECTION-ONE.header-title: Effective relief from pain and pressure on the foot
SECTION-ONE.description-1: Durable, long lasting orthopaedic insoles direct to your door.
SECTION-ONE.description-2: Uses cutting edge technology to digitally map your feet via your mobile device.
SECTION-ONE.quality: Swiss quality, born from over 60 years of experience and orthopaedic craftsmanship. What discerning customers prefer in Zurich you can now also obtain in China.

SECTION-TWO.section-title: Relieves physical problems helping you to lead a more active life

SECTION-THREE.section-title: Relieves pain associated with standing for long periods

SECTION-FOUR.title-1: Simply create your free user account
SECTION-FOUR.title-2: Scan your feet using our app and your mobile device and place your order
SECTION-FOUR.title-3: Using the very latest AI techniques, we build an exact 3D model of your feet
SECTION-FOUR.title-4: Your insoles are then produced in Switzerland and delivered to you within 2 weeks

SECTION-FIVE.section-title: Relieves sports related pain and discomfort

FAQS.head: FAQs
FAQS.faq1-answer: You simply need to take three photographs of each foot using our easy to use, guided app and using AI techniques and that’s enough to build a highly accurate 3d model of each foot. Once this is done you just have to place your order and we do the rest.
FAQS.faq2-answer: We compare your scans with our database of over 500,000 feet, this combined with complex mathematical algorithms means we can very accurately produce custom profiles of your feet from 3 images of each foot.
FAQS.faq3-answer: From the time you place the order we aim to have your insoles delivered to your door within 2 weeks.
FAQS.faq4-question: Why are they made in Switzerland?
FAQS.faq4-answer: Switzerland is renowned for producing high quality products and we are no different. How production facility offers the very best in premium insole quality, capable of withstanding the demands required through heavy usage.
FAQS.faq5-question: Do I have to scan my feet every time I want to place an order?
FAQS.faq5-answer: No, you do this only once and then your 3d feet profile is saved against your account meaning you can re order at any time simply by placing an order.

ABOUT.head: About
ABOUT.description:
Based in Zurich, Switzerland for more than 60 years, Bähler AG has led the way in terms of innovative solutions for the orthopedic care and rehabilitation sector.

We work with highly regarded specialist clinics to drive innovation, seeking new materials or production techniques that deliver pain relief to patients of all ages. We have a deep understanding of our patients needs and requirements and its this that drives us to continuously improve and develop our products and services.

QUESTION1.ques: What of the following best describes you?

QUESTION2.ques1: Do you suffer from pain or discomfort caused by physical activity?
QUESTION2.ques2: Do you suffer from pain and discomfort when standing for prelonged periods of time?

QUESTION3.ques1: Select where you experience pain or discomfort
QUESTION3.ques2: What does your leg axis look like?

RESULT1.result: Mass insoles correct the malpositioning of the foot and leg axis and can thus relieve or eliminate existing pain. They prevent existing malpositions from worsening and relieve overburdened body structures. Wear insoles and benefit from their positive properties.
RESULT1.option.1: Custom made - to the profile of you feet.
RESULT1.option.3: Good value - Exercise with peace of mind.

RESULT2.result: Physical activities like running can over time, place additional pressure on your feet, legs and spine which over time can lead to pain. Wearing insoles ensures you maintain correct posture even when engaging in exercise.
RESULT2.option.1: Custom made - to the profile of you feet.
RESULT2.option.3: Good value - Exercise with peace of mind.

RESULT3.result: Standing and walking for long periods of time causes one-sided strain on the musculoskeletal system and can thus cause physical problems. Pain reduces performance at work and also in leisure time. By wearing insoles, problems can be prevented and existing pain can be positively influenced.
RESULT3.option.1: Custom made - to the profile of you feet.
RESULT3.option.3: Good value - Exercise with peace of mind.
